ygData.subject: Re: Sol Ro Temple Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I have a bard on the test server parked in the Temple just for this reason.  I ll try to remember to check. Talies
ygData.messageBody:
At 05:42 PM 12/18/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: Valharick@...
>
>In a message dated 12/18/99 2:22:33 PM Pacific Standard Time,
>Michael.Garramone@... writes:
>
><< i assume it is not in the game, as there is nothing about the weapon in
> [brackets]. if it is convenient i would check back after each patch.
>
> Shada >>
>
>Just because its no in brackets doesnt mean it itsnt a trigger. Cant remember
>the specific quest at the moment but you got more information for it by
>asking about something that wasnt in brackets.


I have a bard on the test server parked in the Temple just for this
reason. I'll try to remember to check.

Talies
